description: This file defines a React functional component 'FilterSidebar' that provides UI controls for filtering and searching products in a shopping platform. It includes input fields for search and category selection, with callbacks to handle user interactions.

methods.name: FilterSidebar({ search, category, onSearch, onCategory })
methods.description: React functional component for rendering a sidebar with product filtering options, including search input and category dropdown.
